verbose_text: Compared with the mechanically injured chondrocytes transfected with control siRNA, the inhibition of Smad4 markedly increased the percentage of apoptotic cells (10 Mpa, 60 min, injured at 12 h after transfection) at 12 h after the injury was sustained (P < 0.05) (XREF_FIG).
